release.action: Fix handling of empty strings for numeric types in ExcelConfigurationTask
Dates are now always processed using an ISO8601 date format in ExcelConfigurationTask (previously the parsing was left to the jdbc driver, leading to different results with different drivers)
Added a new "enabled" flag in ExcelConfigurationTask
Added ability to set a schema name in it.openutils.migration.generic.JdbcObjectCreationTask and it.openutils.migration.generic.JdbcIfColumnExistsConditionalTask
